20 #include "conveyor_interface/conveyor_interface_core.hpp"
21 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
22 #include <memory>
23 #include <ros/ros.h>
24 #include <ros/service_client.h>
25 
26 #include <string>
27 
28 static std::unique_ptr<ros::NodeHandle> nh;
29 
30 // publish
31 #define MAX_FAILURES 1000
32 #define WAITING_TIME 2.0
33 
38 void wait_spin(double t)
39 {
40  // wait for t seconds
41  double now = ros::Time::now().toSec();
42  while (ros::Time::now().toSec() - now < t)
43  {
44  ros::spinOnce();
45  ros::WallDuration(0.1).sleep();
46  }
47 }
48 
53 void waitForMessage(const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg)
54 {
55  size_t i = 0;
56  while (ros::ok() && msg == nullptr && i < MAX_FAILURES)
57  {
58  ros::spinOnce();
59  ros::WallDuration(0.1).sleep();
60  ++i;
61  }
62  if (i == MAX_FAILURES)
63  {
64  ADD_FAILURE();
65  }
66 
67  wait_spin(2.0);
68 }
69 
73 class ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteAuto : public ::testing::Test
74 {
75  protected:
76  static void SetUpTestCase()
77  {
78  ROS_INFO("SetupTestCase : Auto");
79  _nh_private = std::make_unique<ros::NodeHandle>("~");
80  }
81 
82  static void TearDownTestCase() { ROS_INFO("TearDownTestCase : Auto"); }
83 
84  static std::shared_ptr<ros::NodeHandle> _nh_private;
85 };
86 
87 std::shared_ptr<ros::NodeHandle> ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteAuto::_nh_private;

92 class ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual : public ::testing::Test
93 {
94  protected:
95  static void SetUpTestCase() { ROS_INFO("SetupTestCase : Manual"); }
96 
97  static void TearDownTestCase() { ROS_INFO("TearDownTestCase : Manual"); }
98 };
99 
100 //************************
101 // One conveyor (id 9)
102 // setConveyor : set a newly connected conveyor
103 // controlConveyor1 : change speed
104 // controlConveyor2 : change direction and speed
105 // controlConveyor3 : change direction and speed and set running at false
106 
107 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteAuto, setConveyor)
108 {
109  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
110 
111  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(5)));
112 
113  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
114 
115  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv;
116  srv.request.id = 8;
117  srv.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::ADD;
118  client.call(srv);
119 
120  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
121  EXPECT_NE(srv.response.id, srv.request.id);
122 }
123 
124 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteAuto, controlConveyor1)
125 {
126  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
127 
128  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
129  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
130 
131  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
132  srv.request.id = 9;
133  srv.request.control_on = true;
134  srv.request.speed = 75;
135  srv.request.direction = -1;
136  client.call(srv);
137 
138  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
139 
140  // subscribe to feedback (latch so we will not have lots of messages, only the ones changing)
141 
142  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
143  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
144  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
145 
146  waitForMessage(pcl);
147 
148  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
149 
150  size_t i = 0;
151  while (ros::ok() && pcl->conveyors.empty() && i < MAX_FAILURES)
152  {
153  ros::spinOnce();
154  ros::WallDuration(0.1).sleep();
155  ++i;
156  }
157  if (i == MAX_FAILURES)
158  {
159  ADD_FAILURE();
160  }
161 
162  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
163  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 1U);
164 
165  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, srv.request.id);
166  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).running, srv.request.control_on);
167  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).speed, srv.request.speed);
168  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).direction, srv.request.direction);
169 
170  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
171 }
172 
173 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteAuto, controlConveyor2)
174 {
175  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
176 
177  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
178  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
179 
180  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
181  srv.request.id = 9;
182  srv.request.control_on = true;
183  srv.request.speed = 100;
184  srv.request.direction = -1;
185  client.call(srv);
186 
187  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
188 
189  // subscribe to feedback
190 
191  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
192  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
193  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
194 
195  waitForMessage(pcl);
196 
197  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
198  wait_spin(2.0);
199 
200  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
201  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 1U);
202 
203  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, srv.request.id);
204  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).running, srv.request.control_on);
205  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).speed, srv.request.speed);
206  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).direction, srv.request.direction);
207 
208  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
209 }

211 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteAuto, controlConveyor3)
212 {
213  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
214 
215  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
216  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
217 
218  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
219  srv.request.id = 9;
220  srv.request.control_on = false;
221  srv.request.speed = 60;
222  srv.request.direction = 1;
223  client.call(srv);
224 
225  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
226 
227  // subscribe to feedback
228 
229  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
230  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
231  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
232 
233  waitForMessage(pcl);
234 
235  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
236  wait_spin(2.0);
237 
238  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
239  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 1U);
240 
241  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, srv.request.id);
242  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).running, srv.request.control_on);
243  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).speed, 0);
244 
245  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
246 }

319 
320 //************************
321 // Two conveyor
322 // setTwoConveyor : set two conveyor, one after the other. WARNING : You need to wait for ROS_WARN message to manually connect a second conveyor
323 // Some config hides ROS_WARN message. Use catkin_make or rostest --text to see them
324 // removeAndResetConveyor : remove wrong id
325 // controlTwoConveyors : control two conv at the same time (check that each conv has the correct params)
326 // removeFirstConveyor : to have only one conv remaining, the second one
327 
328 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual, setTwoConveyor)
329 {
330  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
331 
332  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(5)));
333  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
334 
335  // set first conveyor
336  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv;
337  srv.request.id = 8;
338  srv.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::ADD;
339  client.call(srv);
340 
341  uint8_t first_id = static_cast<uint8_t>(srv.response.id);
342  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
343  EXPECT_NE(first_id, srv.request.id);
344 
345  for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i)
346  {
347  ROS_WARN("################### Wait for second conveyor to be manually connected: (%d s) ###################", i);
348  ros::Duration(1).sleep();
349 
350  client.call(srv);
351  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == srv.response.status)
352  break;
353  }
354 
355  // set second conveyor
356  uint8_t second_id = static_cast<uint8_t>(srv.response.id);
357 
358  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
359  EXPECT_NE(first_id, second_id);
360 
361  // subscribe to feedback
362 
363  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
364  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
365  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
366 
367  waitForMessage(pcl);
368 
369  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
370  wait_spin(2.0);
371 
372  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
373  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 2U);
374 
375  EXPECT_NE(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, conv_vec.at(1).conveyor_id);
376 
377  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
378 }
379 
380 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual, removeAndResetConveyor)
381 {
382  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
383 
384  // remove first conveyor
385  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv_rm;
386  srv_rm.request.id = 9;
387  srv_rm.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::REMOVE;
388  client.call(srv_rm);
389 
390  EXPECT_EQ(srv_rm.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
391  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
392 
393  // reset first conveyor -> now the order of the conveyors should be inverted
394  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv_set;
395  srv_set.request.id = 8;
396  srv_set.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::ADD;
397  client.call(srv_set);
398 
399  EXPECT_EQ(srv_set.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
400  EXPECT_EQ(srv_set.response.id, srv_rm.request.id);
401 
402  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
403 
404  // subscribe to feedback
405 
406  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
407  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
408  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
409 
410  waitForMessage(pcl);
411 
412  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
413  wait_spin(2.0);
414 
415  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
416  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 2U);
417 
418  EXPECT_NE(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, conv_vec.at(1).conveyor_id);
419  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(1).conveyor_id, srv_rm.request.id); // expect first id to be now second
420 
421  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
422 }
423 
424 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual, controlBothConveyors)
425 {
426  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
427 
428  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
429  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
430 
431  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv_1;
432  srv_1.request.id = 9;
433  srv_1.request.control_on = true;
434  srv_1.request.speed = 40;
435  srv_1.request.direction = -1;
436  client.call(srv_1);
437  EXPECT_EQ(srv_1.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
438 
439  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv_2;
440  srv_2.request.id = 10;
441  srv_2.request.control_on = true;
442  srv_2.request.speed = 33;
443  srv_2.request.direction = -1;
444  client.call(srv_2);
445 
446  EXPECT_EQ(srv_2.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
447 
448  // subscribe to feedbacks
449 
450  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
451  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
452  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
453 
454  waitForMessage(pcl);
455 
456  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
457  wait_spin(2.0);
458 
459  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
460  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 2U);
461 
462  // we remove and reset first conveyor, we should now have an inverted situation
463  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(1).conveyor_id, srv_1.request.id);
464  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(1).running, srv_1.request.control_on);
465  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(1).speed, srv_1.request.speed);
466  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(1).direction, srv_1.request.direction);
467 
468  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, srv_2.request.id);
469  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).running, srv_2.request.control_on);
470  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).speed, srv_2.request.speed);
471  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).direction, srv_2.request.direction);
472 
473  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
474 }
475

491 //************************
492 // One conveyor (id 10)
493 // controlConveyor1_bis : change speed
494 // controlConveyor2_bis : change direction and speed
495 // controlConveyor3_bis : change direction and speed and set running at false
496 // removeConveyor_bis : to have only one conv remaining, the second one
497 
498 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual, controlConveyor1_bis)
499 {
500  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
501 
502  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
503  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
504 
505  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
506  srv.request.id = 10;
507  srv.request.control_on = true;
508  srv.request.speed = 75;
509  srv.request.direction = 1;
510  client.call(srv);
511 
512  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
513 
514  // subscribe to feedback
515 
516  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
517  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
518  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
519 
520  waitForMessage(pcl);
521 
522  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
523  wait_spin(2.0);
524 
525  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
526  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 1U);
527 
528  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, srv.request.id);
529  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).running, srv.request.control_on);
530  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).speed, srv.request.speed);
531  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).direction, srv.request.direction);
532  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
533 }

573 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual, controlConveyor3_bis)
574 {
575  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
576 
577  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
578  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
579 
580  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
581  srv.request.id = 10;
582  srv.request.control_on = false;
583  srv.request.speed = 62;
584  srv.request.direction = 1;
585  client.call(srv);
586 
587  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
588 
589  // subscribe to feedback
590 
591  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr pcl;
592  auto subscriber = nh->subscribe<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 1,
593  [&pcl](const conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArrayConstPtr &msg) { pcl = msg; });
594 
595  waitForMessage(pcl);
596 
597  EXPECT_EQ(subscriber.getNumPublishers(), 1U);
598  wait_spin(2.0);
599 
600  auto conv_vec = pcl->conveyors;
601  ASSERT_EQ(conv_vec.size(), 1U);
602 
603  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).conveyor_id, srv.request.id);
604  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).running, srv.request.control_on);
605  EXPECT_EQ(conv_vec.at(0).speed, 0);
606 
607  wait_spin(WAITING_TIME);
608 }
609 
610 TEST_F(ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual, removeConveyor_bis)
611 {
612  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
613 
614  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
615  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
616 
617  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv;
618  srv.request.id = 10;
619  srv.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::REMOVE;
620  client.call(srv);
621 
622  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
623 }
624 
625 int main(int argc, char **argv)
626 {
627  testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
628 
629  ros::init(argc, argv, "conveyor_interface_service_client");
630 
631  nh = std::make_unique<ros::NodeHandle>();
632 
633  bool manual_tests{false};
634  ros::NodeHandle nh_private("~");
635  nh_private.getParam("manual_tests", manual_tests);
636  ROS_DEBUG("manual_tests: %s", manual_tests ? "True" : "False");
637 
638  // remove manual tests if automatic mode
639  if (!manual_tests)
640  testing::GTEST_FLAG(filter) = "-ConveyorInterfaceTestSuiteManual.*";
641 
642  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
643 }
